phrases: I think I have a crush on Azumi-kun
That is right, that is right.
Dazai once said, People exist for love and for revolution.
The road is part of your yard
Your time was good today, Chinatsu.
Well, the race is next week.
It actually tastes like kinako and soda.
Your language arts grade was good, was not it?
I am not saying you should not go to the festival.
I am just worried about your exams.
It is an important time for you, Kotarou.
This is Kitamura of Kadoyama Publishing.
Thank you for your submission for the newcomer award.
Can you give me a minute?
You made way too much, Mom.
You are competing on Sunday, are not you?
We will be there to cheer for you.
Maybe she is got a boyfriend now?
Want to meet in the school library sometime tomorrow morning?
I think I have a crush on Azumi-kun
I have something to discuss with you, too.
Yeah, the publisher called me and said they wanted to meet with me.
I still do not know what they want to say.
You might be winning that award.
Oh, but it is this Sunday.
Sorry I cannot come cheer for you.
Let us both do our best.
You said you wanted to talk.
About that LINE message the other day...
Wow, Mizuno's next to Sasaki from Nishi Middle School.
Sorry to bring you out here.
I am an editor for ABC Publishing.
We are searching for young writers right now.
You are in middle school, are not you?
Well, to be honest, I do not think you are cut out for serious literature.
You should give up on it.
Honestly, though, serious literature does not make any money.
I do not recommend it anyway.
Why do not you try light novel-type stuff instead?
I have a feeling you could do it, Azumi-san.
I think it would be a better way to spend your time than chasing after literature awards.
You could get your name out there easily.
There are tons of people who end up in their thirties, still trying to become writers.
You should give it a shot while you still have youth on your side.
So it is just Nishio going on to the semi-finals, huh?
Nishio-senpai set a new personal best, too.
You were not focused at all, were you?
I was sure you could make it to prefecturals.
Your time was actually worse than last year.
You really look like you are having fun when you are running.
Your father told me what happened.
Like I said, you ought to hear him out a little more.
He does not realize the urgency of his situation because you talk like that!
The festival is one thing, but nothing good can come of writing.
Well, there are plenty of races left.
Yeah is all you have been saying.
I am going back to my room.
You cannot keep up both at once, and you end up losing both.
I just could not focus on the race.
Actually, my best friend told me...
That she likes the same guy.
You have to ditch her, duh!
Because... my friends are important, too.
I seriously do not get it.
Are you sure you can stay friends with her?
I want to focus on track.
I am going to do more.
I am going to do it seriously.
I am going to go further.
I wanted to talk to you properly.
Sorry I did not tell you we were dating.
And I am sorry I fell for him.
I do not know what to do.
I am the one who likes her!
Just give them to me, damn it.
Hey, what do you like about me?
Ryouko-sensei's so cute, do not you think?
Try to guess what I want for my birthday.
she was staring at that stuffed teddy...
Not that I have any plans, but...
I think you would look good in a dress.
I bet you would look cute.
Hey, let us get a picture.
No, I look ugly from that angle.
A little more to the right.
From that angle, like this, with a matching pose.
Oh, and the expression is important, too.
Do not take the picture until I say it is okay, no matter what.
I cannot post it on my feed with me looking like this!
Let us try again, from the beginning.
